panels.description: Number of connected Sensors. This equals the number of secured clusters.
panels.title: Sensors

panels.description: Number of objects in each table
panels.title: Postgres Object Count

options.content:
* The jagged pattern associated with
`network_flows_v2` is the expected behavior. 
To maintain write performance, the
underlying table follows an insert only
pattern. Stale and duplicate flows are removed
during the pruning cycle.
